entry.title: Linux
entry.summary: This is where I am logging everything I know about Linux. There are so many distros out there. Whatever here works on debian based system like Ubuntu or Linux Mint, and may be with slight tinkering for other distros.
entry.content: This is where I am logging everything I know about Linux. There are so many distros out there. Whatever here works on debian based system like Ubuntu or Linux Mint, and may be with slight tinkering for other distros.
